title: 地皮世界怎么设置没有怪
author: WW_GG

replies.author: WW_GG
replies.txt_content:
逗比桃 发表于 2016-4-20 18:31
/mv gamerule doMobSpawning false
不行怎么办

replies.author: WW_GG
replies.txt_content:
逗比桃 发表于 2016-4-20 18:31
/mv gamerule doMobSpawning false
看错了  可以了

replies.author: 钻石梦想
replies.txt_content:
WW_GG 发表于 2016-4-20 18:33
不行怎么办
/mv gamerule doMobSpawning true

replies.author: 钻石梦想
replies.txt_content: 如果还不行的话，你直接吧地皮弄成和平模式不久可以了
